Class Villain

  • java.lang.Object
    • Person
      • Villain
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    finalVillain

    public class Villain
extends Person
    Date: April 30th 2018 Villain class determines attributes and methods of a Villain. Person is Villain's parent class and finalVillain is a subclass of Villain. The class provides Object Villain attributes such as Health (in the form of Strikes), Damage, Mini-Game preference and Taunts. Includes getter and setter methods for said Attributes.
    Author:
    Sachin Sakthivel and Sasiru Goonatillake

    • Constructor Detail

      • Villain

        public Villain​()
        Constructor method for Villain Class. Name is given to the villain from randomly choosing a String Variable from the ArrayList 'possibleNames'. Damage is set 20 by default plus a random amount of 0 to 15. Taunt Phrase is chosen in a similar manner to Name using ArrayList 'possibleTaunts'. Strikes are set to 3 by default.

    • Method Detail

      • getDamage

        public int getDamage​()
        This method returns a Villain's attribute Damage.
        Returns:
        Returns Integer variable, Damage, of Villain.

      • setDamage

        public void setDamage​(int damage)
        This method sets a Villain's Damage attribute to input variable 'damage'.
        Parameters:
        damage - Integer variable referencing Damage attribute.

        public int getStrikes​()

      • gamePreference

        public int gamePreference​()
        This method returns an Integer variable referencing the minigame which is preferred by the villain. For the Final Villain, the games are predetermined using the no of Strikes left for Fianl Villain.
        Returns:
        Returns Integer variable related to Villan's preferred minigame.

      • checkdeath

        public boolean checkdeath​()
        This method checks whether the Villain is dead by Strikes left. If Strikes is less than 0, method returns Boolean true, else returns false.
        Returns:
        Returns true of false depending on Strikes left for the Villain.
